metadata.title: CVE-2022-2602 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - high
metadata.description:
io_uring UAF, Unix SCM garbage collection

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2602` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 5.19.0-23.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 5.19.0-1010.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.2.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1003.3
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.2.0-1004.5
No subscription required
